languages.text: "Со спутника Магос Маруф передано: в систему транслировался корабль. Сигнатура соответствует отметкам о флагманском корабле династии {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольных Торговцев{/g} фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "Со спутника Магос Маруф передано: в систему транслировался корабль. Сигнатура соответствует отметкам о флагманском корабле династии {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольных Торговцев{/g} фон Валанциус".

languages.text: "The satellite Magos Ma'rouf reports that a ship has translated into the system. Its signature is consistent with the records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."
languages.original_text: "Со спутника Магос Маруф передано: в систему транслировался корабль. Сигнатура соответствует отметкам о флагманском корабле династии {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольных Торговцев{/g} фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "Magos Ma'arouf Satellite reports that a ship has translated into the system. Its signature is consistent with records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

"Magos Ma'arouf Satellite reports that a ship has translated into the system. Its signature is consistent with records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

"Magos Ma'arouf Satellite reports that the ship's signal has been broadcast through the system. Its signature is consistent with the records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

"Magos Ma'arouf Satellite reports that the ship's signal has been broadcast through the system. Its signature is consistent with the records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

"The satellite Magos Ma'rouf reports that the ship's signal has been broadcast through the system. Its signature is consistent with the records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

"The satellite Magos Ma'rouf reports that the ship's signal has been broadcast through the system. Its signature is consistent with the records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

languages.text: "Der Satellit von Magos Ma'rouf meldet, dass ein Schiff in das System eingedrungen ist. Die Signatur stimmt mit den Daten des Flaggschiffs einer {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}-Dynastie überein, des Hauses Valancius."
languages.original_text: "The satellite Magos Ma'rouf reports that a ship has translated into the system. Its signature is consistent with the records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: "Der Satellit Magos Ma'rouf berichtet, dass das Signal des Schiffs im ganzen System übertragen wurde. Die Signatur stimmt mit den Daten des Flaggschiffs einer {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}-Dynastie überein, des Hauses Valancius."

languages.text: « Le satellite Magos Ma'rouf indique qu'un vaisseau a translaté dans le système. Sa signature correspond aux archives du vaisseau amiral d'une dynastie de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g} : la maison von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "The satellite Magos Ma'rouf reports that a ship has translated into the system. Its signature is consistent with the records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: « Le satellite Magos Ma'rouf indique que le signal du vaisseau a été diffusé à travers le système. Sa signature correspond aux archives du vaisseau amiral d'une dynastie de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g} : la maison von Valancius. »

languages.text: “根据卫星‘玛鲁夫贤者’的报告，那艘舰船跃迁到了这个星系，舰船编码与某个名为冯·瓦兰修斯的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}王朝旗舰记录一致。”
languages.original_text: "The satellite Magos Ma'rouf reports that a ship has translated into the system. Its signature is consistent with the records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: “根据卫星‘玛鲁夫贤者’的报告，这艘舰船的信号在整个星系进行了广播。广播署名与某个名为冯·瓦兰修斯的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}王朝旗舰记录一致。”

languages.text: 「マゴス・マルーフ衛星によると、船が星系に侵入したとのこと。その署名は、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の王朝フォン・ヴァランシウス家の旗艦の記録と一致した」
languages.original_text: "The satellite Magos Ma'rouf reports that a ship has translated into the system. Its signature is consistent with the records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: 「マゴス・マルーフ衛星は、船の信号がシステムを通じて一斉送信されたと報告している。その署名は、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の王朝フォン・ヴァランシウス家の旗艦の記録と一致した」

languages.text: «El satélite Magos Ma'rouf informa de que una nave ha entrado al sistema. Su firma concuerda con los registros de la nave insignia de una dinastía de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}, la casa von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "The satellite Magos Ma'rouf reports that a ship has translated into the system. Its signature is consistent with the records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: «El satélite Magos Ma'arouf informa que la señal de la nave ha sido emitida a través del sistema. Su firma concuerda con los registros de la nave insignia de una dinastía de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes {/g}, la casa von Valancius».

languages.text: "Magos Ma'rouf uydusu, bir geminin sisteme intikal ettiğini bildirmiş. İmzası, bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} hanedanlığı olan von Valancius Hanesi'nin sancak gemisinin kayıtlarındakiyle birebir örtüşüyor."
languages.original_text: "The satellite Magos Ma'rouf reports that a ship has translated into the system. Its signature is consistent with the records of the flagship of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty, House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: "Magos Ma'rouf uydusu, bir geminin sisteme intikal ettiğini bildirmiş. İmzası, bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} hanedanlığı olan von Valancius Hanesi'nin sancak gemisinin kayıtlarındakiyle birebir örtüşüyor."
